items.sentence: I don\'t think that\'s what people really think.
Tom seems really scared about what might happen.
Tom seems to be unwilling to tackle the problem.
Tom should have known better than to trust Mary.
What\'s your favorite food to eat with red wine?
Don\'t think that I\'m going to let you do that.
Don\'t worry. I\'ll look after your dog for you.
Did you have any difficulty in finding my house?
Did you have any warning that this could happen?
I don\'t have enough money to buy another house.
